text: 'in rabukum -ayha alnas- hu allah aladhi awjd alsmwat wal'ard min aledm fi stt ayam, thuma astwa -sbhanh- ealaa alearsh -ay eala wartfe- astwa'an ylyq bjlalh wezmth, yudkhl subhanah allayl ealaa alnhar, fylbsh 'iiaah hataa yadhhab nwrh, wyudkhl alnahar ealaa allayl fayadhhab zlamh, wakulu wahid minhuma yatlub alakhar sryeana daymana, wahu -sbhanh- aladhi khalaq alshams walqamar walnujum mdhllat lah yskhrhn -sbhanh- kama ysha', whnn min ayat allah alezym. 'ala lah subhanah wteala alkhalq klh walah al'amr klh, taealaa allah wteazm wtnzzah ean kl nqs, rabi alkhalq ajmeyn
